trans-unit.source: Represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile that is associated with a bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] profilo associato a un'immagine bitmap a colori.

trans-unit.source: The supported standard color spaces are sRGB, ScRGB, RGB, CMYK, Gray, Multichannel, and unknown.
trans-unit.target: Gli spazi colore standard supportati sono sRGB, ScRGB, RGB, CMYK, grigio, multicanale e sconosciuto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile located at a given <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> con il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] si trova in un determinato <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri> profilo colori

trans-unit.source: To use any of the unsupported color profiles, you must install one and use its URI to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext> by using the ColorContext constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare uno dei profili colore non supportato, è necessario installare uno e utilizzare il relativo URI per inizializzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>mediante il costruttore ColorContext.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> that identifies the location of the desired color profile.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Uri>che identifica il percorso del profilo colori desiderato.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> with the standard color profile (sRGB or RGB ) that most closely matches the supplied <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> con il profilo colori standard (sRGB o RGB) che corrisponde maggiormente fornito <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref> from which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> is derived.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"> </xref> da cui il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> derivato.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an <xref:System.Object> is equal to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un <xref:System.Object>è uguale a un'istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Object> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Object>da confrontare per verificarne l'uguaglianza.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the supplied <xref:System.Object> is equal to this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto fornito <xref:System.Object>è uguale a questa istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il codice hash per questa istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> that represents the hash code for the object.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Int32>che rappresenta il codice hash per l'oggetto.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Operates on two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to determine equality.
trans-unit.target: Opera su due istanze di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> per determinare l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: La prima istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: La seconda istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se le istanze di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> sono uguali; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Operates on two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to determine that they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Opera su due istanze di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> per determinare che non sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: La prima istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: La seconda istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se le istanze di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> non sono uguali; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a readable <xref:System.IO.Stream> of raw color profile data.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un oggetto leggibile <xref:System.IO.Stream>di dati di profilo colori non elaborati.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A readable <xref:System.IO.Stream> of raw color profile data.
trans-unit.target: Leggibile <xref:System.IO.Stream>di dati di profilo colori non elaborati.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Uri> that represents the location of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref:System.Uri>che rappresenta la posizione di un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] profilo colori.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> that represents the location of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Uri>che rappresenta la posizione di un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] profilo colori.</xref:System.Uri>
